officialTitle: Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) Characterization of Carotid Plaque and Prediction of End-organ and Clinical Outcomes
inclusionCriteria:
* male and female patients over the age of 18 years.
* written informed consent (approved by the Institutional Review Board \[IRB\]/Independent Ethics Committee \[IEC\]) obtained prior to any study specific procedures.
* patient with mild to severe carotid artery disease
* Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusionCriteria: * any condition that would contra-indicate Magnetic Resonance Imaging or administration of contrast agent
